QuestData.Title: Souls Come Home
QuestData.Description:
To the tree, to the tree! It is time for us to return to the grove.
We have our anima. We have our forms. The Tall Tree needs the anima. The Tall Tree will be happy!
I will see you there!
QuestData.LogDescription: Report your success to Droman Tashmur in Tirna Vaal.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report your success to Droman Tashmur in Tirna Vaal.
QuestData.RewardText:
From acorns grow forests, from souls comes vital anima. Small though they be, on them our fates depend.
The forest sighs in gratitude.
